sentences.en: Dwight Eisenhower possessed much the same ability to appear likeable.
sentences.cn: 德怀特·艾森豪威尔也具备上述做出讨人喜欢的样子的能力。
他行为举止像是魔怔了。

sentences.en: He is possessed of an extraordinary fund of energy.
He possessed a raw energy allied to a feeling of something special.
sentences.cn: 他粗犷豪放，给人一种特殊的感觉。

sentences.en: He possessed a vast store of knowledge.
In prison they'd taken away his watch and everything he possessed.
sentences.cn: 在监狱，他们把他的手表和其他一切东西都搜走了。

sentences.en: Portugal and Spain had possessed vast empires that waxed and waned.
sentences.cn: 葡萄牙和西班牙都曾是经历了兴衰的大帝国。

sentences.en: She has convinced herself that she is possessed by the devil.
sentences.cn: 她确信自己被魔鬼附了身。

sentences.en: She is clearly the most articulate and self-possessed member of her family.
sentences.cn: 显然，她是全家口才最好、最沉着冷静的人。

sentences.en: She was convinced he was possessed by the devil .
sentences.cn: 她确信他被魔鬼附身了。

sentences.en: The desire to be rich possessed him to act so.
sentences.cn: 发财的欲望使他做出如此之事来.

sentences.en: The plantation owner has possessed himself of a vast piece of land.
sentences.cn: 这个种植园主把大片土地占为己有.

sentences.en: They believed she was possessed by devils.
sentences.cn: 他们认为她是魔鬼附身。

sentences.en: They has possessed themselves of all the necessary material.
sentences.cn: 他们已取得了所有必要的材料.

sentences.en: What on earth had possessed her to agree to marry him?
sentences.cn: 究竟是什么让她同意嫁给他的？

trans.tran_cn: 拥有的，占有的，着魔的，疯狂的
trans.tran_en: if someone is possessed, their mind is controlled by something evil

trans.tran_cn: 拥有( possess的过去式和过去分词)
